arabicText: إِنَّمَا الْأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ، وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مَا نَوَى، فَمَنْ كَانَتْ هِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ فَهِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ، وَمَنْ كَانَتْ هِجْرَتُهُ لِدُنْيَا يُصِيبُهَا أَوْ امْرَأَةٍ يَنْكِحُهَا فَهِجْرَتُهُ إِلَى مَا هَاجَرَ إِلَيْهِ
englishTranslation: Actions are judged by intentions, and every person will have what they intended. Whoever's migration was to Allah and His Messenger, his migration is to Allah and His Messenger; and whoever's migration was for worldly gain or to marry a woman, his migration is to that for which he migrated.
uzbekTranslation: Amallar niyatlarga bog'liqdir. Har bir kishiga niyat qilgan narsasi nasib etadi. Kim hijrati Alloh va Uning Rasuli tomon bo'lsa, uning hijrati Alloh va Uning Rasuli tomondir. Kim hijrati dunyoga erishish yoki ayolga uylanish uchun bo'lsa, uning hijrati hijrat qilgan narsasi tomondir.

arabicText: بَيْنَمَا نَحْنُ جُلُوسٌ عِنْدَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ ذَاتَ يَوْمٍ، إِذْ طَلَعَ عَلَيْنَا رَجُلٌ شَدِيدُ بَيَاضِ الثِّيَابِ، شَدِيدُ سَوَادِ الشَّعَرِ، لَا يُرَى عَلَيْهِ أَثَرُ السَّفَرِ، وَلَا يَعْرِفُهُ مِنَّا أَحَدٌ
englishTranslation: Islam is to testify that there is no deity except Allah and Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah, to establish prayer, to give zakat, to fast Ramadan, and to perform Hajj if you are able. Iman is to believe in Allah, His angels, His books, His messengers, the Last Day, and to believe in destiny, both good and bad. Ihsan is to worship Allah as though you see Him, and if you cannot see Him, then indeed He sees you.

arabicText: بُنِيَ الْإِسْلَامُ عَلَى خَمْسٍ: شَهَادَةِ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا رَسُولُ اللَّهِ، وَإِقَامِ الصَّلَاةِ، وَإِيتَاءِ الزَّكَاةِ، وَحَجِّ الْبَيْتِ، وَصَوْمِ رَمَضَانَ
englishTranslation: Islam is built upon five pillars: testifying that there is no deity except Allah and that Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah, establishing prayer, giving zakat, performing Hajj to the House, and fasting Ramadan.

arabicText: إِنَّ أَحَدَكُمْ يُجْمَعُ خَلْقُهُ فِي بَطْنِ أُمِّهِ أَرْبَعِينَ يَوْمًا نُطْفَةً، ثُمَّ يَكُونُ عَلَقَةً مِثْلَ ذَلِكَ، ثُمَّ يَكُونُ مُضْغَةً مِثْلَ ذَلِكَ، ثُمَّ يُرْسَلُ إِلَيْهِ الْمَلَكُ فَيَنْفُخُ فِيهِ الرُّوحَ
englishTranslation: Verily, the creation of each one of you is brought together in his mother's womb for forty days as a drop, then he becomes a clot for a like period, then a piece of flesh for a like period, then an angel is sent to him who breathes the soul into him.

arabicText: مَنْ أَحْدَثَ فِي أَمْرِنَا هَذَا مَا لَيْسَ مِنْهُ فَهُوَ رَدٌّ
englishTranslation: Whoever innovates something in this matter of ours (Islam) that is not part of it, it will be rejected.

arabicText: إِنَّ الْحَلَالَ بَيِّنٌ، وَإِنَّ الْحَرَامَ بَيِّنٌ، وَبَيْنَهُمَا مُشْتَبِهَاتٌ لَا يَعْلَمُهُنَّ كَثِيرٌ مِنْ النَّاسِ، فَمَنْ اتَّقَى الشُّبُهَاتِ اسْتَبْرَأَ لِدِينِهِ وَعِرْضِهِ
englishTranslation: The lawful is clear and the unlawful is clear, and between them are matters unclear that many people do not know. Whoever avoids the unclear matters clears himself regarding his religion and honor.

arabicText: الدِّينُ النَّصِيحَةُ. قُلْنَا: لِمَنْ؟ قَالَ: لِلَّهِ، وَلِكِتَابِهِ، وَلِرَسُولِهِ، وَلِأَئِمَّةِ الْمُسْلِمِينَ وَعَامَّتِهِمْ
englishTranslation: Religion is sincerity. We said: To whom? He said: To Allah, His Book, His Messenger, and to the leaders of the Muslims and their common folk.

arabicText: أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أُقَاتِلَ النَّاسَ حَتَّى يَشْهَدُوا أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا رَسُولُ اللَّهِ، وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ، وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ
englishTranslation: I have been commanded to fight the people until they testify that there is no deity except Allah and that Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah, establish prayer, and give zakat.

arabicText: مَا نَهَيْتُكُمْ عَنْهُ فَاجْتَنِبُوهُ، وَمَا أَمَرْتُكُمْ بِهِ فَأْتُوا مِنْهُ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُمْ
englishTranslation: What I have forbidden for you, avoid it, and what I have commanded you, do as much of it as you can.

arabicText: إِنَّ اللَّهَ طَيِّبٌ لَا يَقْبَلُ إِلَّا طَيِّبًا
englishTranslation: Allah is pure and accepts only that which is pure.

arabicText: دَعْ مَا يَرِيبُكَ إِلَى مَا لَا يَرِيبُكَ
englishTranslation: Leave that which makes you doubt for that which does not make you doubt.

arabicText: مِنْ حُسْنِ إِسْلَامِ الْمَرْءِ تَرْكُهُ مَا لَا يَعْنِيهِ
englishTranslation: Part of the perfection of a person's Islam is leaving that which does not concern him.

arabicText: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لِأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِهِ
englishTranslation: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.

arabicText: لَا يَحِلُّ دَمُ امْرِئٍ مُسْلِمٍ إِلَّا بِإِحْدَى ثَلَاثٍ: الثَّيِّبُ الزَّانِي، وَالنَّفْسُ بِالنَّفْسِ، وَالتَّارِكُ لِدِينِهِ الْمُفَارِقُ لِلْجَمَاعَةِ
englishTranslation: The blood of a Muslim is not lawful except for one of three things: a married person who commits adultery, a life for a life, and one who leaves his religion and abandons the community.

arabicText: مَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ فَلْيَقُلْ خَيْرًا أَوْ لِيَصْمُتْ، وَمَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ فَلْيُكْرِمْ جَارَهُ، وَمَنْ كَانَ يُؤْمِنُ بِاللَّهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْآخِرِ فَلْيُكْرِمْ ضَيْفَهُ
englishTranslation: Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should speak good or remain silent. Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should honor his neighbor. Whoever believes in Allah and the Last Day should honor his guest.

arabicText: لَا تَغْضَبْ
englishTranslation: Do not become angry.

arabicText: إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَتَبَ الْإِحْسَانَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ، فَإِذَا قَتَلْتُمْ فَأَحْسِنُوا الْقِتْلَةَ، وَإِذَا ذَبَحْتُمْ فَأَحْسِنُوا الذِّبْحَةَ
englishTranslation: Allah has prescribed excellence in all things. So if you kill, kill well; and if you slaughter, slaughter well.

arabicText: اتَّقِ اللَّهَ حَيْثُمَا كُنْتَ، وَأَتْبِعْ السَّيِّئَةَ الْحَسَنَةَ تَمْحُهَا، وَخَالِقِ النَّاسَ بِخُلُقٍ حَسَنٍ
englishTranslation: Fear Allah wherever you are, follow up a bad deed with a good deed and it will erase it, and treat people with good character.
narrator: Abu Dharr and Mu'adh ibn Jabal

arabicText: احْفَظْ اللَّهَ يَحْفَظْكَ، احْفَظْ اللَّهَ تَجِدْهُ تُجَاهَكَ، إِذَا سَأَلْتَ فَاسْأَلْ اللَّهَ، وَإِذَا اسْتَعَنْتَ فَاسْتَعِنْ بِاللَّهِ
englishTranslation: Be mindful of Allah and He will protect you. Be mindful of Allah and you will find Him before you. When you ask, ask Allah, and when you seek help, seek help from Allah.

arabicText: إِنَّ مِمَّا أَدْرَكَ النَّاسُ مِنْ كَلَامِ النُّبُوَّةِ الْأُولَى: إِذَا لَمْ تَسْتَحِ فَاصْنَعْ مَا شِئْتَ
englishTranslation: Among the words people obtained from the first prophecy are: If you have no shame, do as you wish.

arabicText: قُلْتُ: يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ قُلْ لِي فِي الْإِسْلَامِ قَوْلًا لَا أَسْأَلُ عَنْهُ أَحَدًا غَيْرَكَ. قَالَ: قُلْ آمَنْتُ بِاللَّهِ ثُمَّ اسْتَقِمْ
englishTranslation: I said: O Messenger of Allah, tell me something about Islam which I will not ask anyone else about. He said: Say 'I believe in Allah' and then be steadfast.

arabicText: أَرَأَيْتَ إِذَا صَلَّيْتُ الْمَكْتُوبَاتِ، وَصُمْتُ رَمَضَانَ، وَأَحْلَلْتُ الْحَلَالَ، وَحَرَّمْتُ الْحَرَامَ، وَلَمْ أَزِدْ عَلَى ذَلِكَ شَيْئًا، أَأَدْخُلُ الْجَنَّةَ؟ قَالَ: نَعَمْ
englishTranslation: A man asked: If I pray the prescribed prayers, fast Ramadan, treat the lawful as lawful and the unlawful as unlawful, and do nothing further, will I enter Paradise? He said: Yes.

arabicText: الطُّهُورُ شَطْرُ الْإِيمَانِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ تَمْلَأُ الْمِيزَانَ، وَسُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ تَمْلَآنِ مَا بَيْنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ
englishTranslation: Purification is half of faith. 'Alhamdulillah' fills the scales. 'SubhanAllah' and 'Alhamdulillah' fill what is between heaven and earth.
narrator: Abu Malik al-Harith ibn Asim al-Ash'ari

arabicText: قَالَ اللَّهُ تَعَالَى: يَا عِبَادِي، إِنِّي حَرَّمْتُ الظُّلْمَ عَلَى نَفْسِي وَجَعَلْتُهُ بَيْنَكُمْ مُحَرَّمًا فَلَا تَظَالَمُوا
englishTranslation: Allah Almighty said: O My servants, I have forbidden injustice for Myself and have made it forbidden amongst you, so do not oppress one another.

arabicText: إِنَّ بِكُلِّ تَسْبِيحَةٍ صَدَقَةً، وَكُلِّ تَكْبِيرَةٍ صَدَقَةً، وَكُلِّ تَحْمِيدَةٍ صَدَقَةً، وَكُلِّ تَهْلِيلَةٍ صَدَقَةً
englishTranslation: Every glorification is charity, every declaration of Allah's greatness is charity, every praise is charity, every declaration of Allah's oneness is charity.

arabicText: كُلُّ سُلَامَى مِنْ النَّاسِ عَلَيْهِ صَدَقَةٌ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ تَطْلُعُ فِيهِ الشَّمْسُ
englishTranslation: Every joint of a person must perform charity each day that the sun rises.

arabicText: الْبِرُّ حُسْنُ الْخُلُقِ، وَالْإِثْمُ مَا حَاكَ فِي نَفْسِكَ وَكَرِهْتَ أَنْ يَطَّلِعَ عَلَيْهِ النَّاسُ
englishTranslation: Righteousness is good character, and sin is what wavers in your heart and you dislike that people would become aware of it.

arabicText: أُوصِيكُمْ بِتَقْوَى اللَّهِ، وَالسَّمْعِ وَالطَّاعَةِ وَإِنْ تَأَمَّرَ عَلَيْكُمْ عَبْدٌ
englishTranslation: I advise you to fear Allah, and to hear and obey even if a slave is appointed over you.

arabicText: قُلْتُ: يَا رَسُولَ اللَّهِ، أَخْبِرْنِي بِعَمَلٍ يُدْخِلُنِي الْجَنَّةَ وَيُبَاعِدُنِي عَنْ النَّارِ. قَالَ: لَقَدْ سَأَلْتَ عَنْ عَظِيمٍ، وَإِنَّهُ لَيَسِيرٌ عَلَى مَنْ يَسَّرَهُ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ
englishTranslation: I said: O Messenger of Allah, tell me of a deed that will admit me to Paradise and distance me from Hell. He said: You have asked about a great matter, yet it is easy for one whom Allah makes it easy for.

arabicText: إِنَّ اللَّهَ فَرَضَ فَرَائِضَ فَلَا تُضَيِّعُوهَا، وَحَدَّ حُدُودًا فَلَا تَعْتَدُوهَا، وَحَرَّمَ أَشْيَاءَ فَلَا تَنْتَهِكُوهَا
englishTranslation: Allah has ordained obligations, so do not neglect them. He has set boundaries, so do not transgress them. He has forbidden things, so do not violate them.

arabicText: ازْهَدْ فِي الدُّنْيَا يُحِبَّكَ اللَّهُ، وَازْهَدْ فِيمَا عِنْدَ النَّاسِ يُحِبَّكَ النَّاسُ
englishTranslation: Be indifferent to the world and Allah will love you. Be indifferent to what people possess and people will love you.

arabicText: لَا ضَرَرَ وَلَا ضِرَارَ
englishTranslation: There should be neither harm nor reciprocating harm.

arabicText: لَوْ يُعْطَى النَّاسُ بِدَعْوَاهُمْ لَادَّعَى رِجَالٌ أَمْوَالَ قَوْمٍ وَدِمَاءَهُمْ، لَكِنَّ الْبَيِّنَةَ عَلَى الْمُدَّعِي وَالْيَمِينَ عَلَى مَنْ أَنْكَرَ
englishTranslation: If people were given according to their claims, some would claim the wealth and blood of others. But the burden of proof is on the claimant, and the oath is upon the one who denies.

arabicText: مَنْ رَأَى مِنْكُمْ مُنْكَرًا فَلْيُغَيِّرْهُ بِيَدِهِ، فَإِنْ لَمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَبِلِسَانِهِ، فَإِنْ لَمْ يَسْتَطِعْ فَبِقَلْبِهِ، وَذَلِكَ أَضْعَفُ الْإِيمَانِ
englishTranslation: Whoever among you sees an evil, let him change it with his hand; if he cannot, then with his tongue; if he cannot, then with his heart, and that is the weakest of faith.

arabicText: لَا تَحَاسَدُوا، وَلَا تَنَاجَشُوا، وَلَا تَبَاغَضُوا، وَلَا تَدَابَرُوا، وَلَا يَبِعْ بَعْضُكُمْ عَلَى بَيْعِ بَعْضٍ، وَكُونُوا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ إِخْوَانًا
englishTranslation: Do not envy one another, do not artificially raise prices, do not hate one another, do not turn away from one another, do not undercut one another in trade. Be, O servants of Allah, brothers.

arabicText: مَنْ نَفَّسَ عَنْ مُؤْمِنٍ كُرْبَةً مِنْ كُرَبِ الدُّنْيَا نَفَّسَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُ كُرْبَةً مِنْ كُرَبِ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
englishTranslation: Whoever relieves a believer of distress in this world, Allah will relieve him of distress on the Day of Resurrection.

arabicText: إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَتَبَ الْحَسَنَاتِ وَالسَّيِّئَاتِ ثُمَّ بَيَّنَ ذَلِكَ، فَمَنْ هَمَّ بِحَسَنَةٍ فَلَمْ يَعْمَلْهَا كَتَبَهَا اللَّهُ عِنْدَهُ حَسَنَةً كَامِلَةً
englishTranslation: Allah has recorded good deeds and bad deeds. Whoever intends a good deed but does not do it, Allah records it as a complete good deed.

arabicText: قَالَ اللَّهُ تَعَالَى: مَنْ عَادَى لِي وَلِيًّا فَقَدْ آذَنْتُهُ بِالْحَرْبِ
englishTranslation: Allah Almighty said: Whoever shows enmity to a friend of Mine, I have declared war upon him.

arabicText: إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَجَاوَزَ لِي عَنْ أُمَّتِي الْخَطَأَ وَالنِّسْيَانَ وَمَا اسْتُكْرِهُوا عَلَيْهِ
englishTranslation: Allah has pardoned my nation for mistakes, forgetfulness, and what they are forced to do.

arabicText: كُنْ فِي الدُّنْيَا كَأَنَّكَ غَرِيبٌ أَوْ عَابِرُ سَبِيلٍ
englishTranslation: Be in this world as if you were a stranger or a traveler.

arabicText: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يَكُونَ هَوَاهُ تَبَعًا لِمَا جِئْتُ بِهِ
englishTranslation: None of you truly believes until his desires follow what I have brought.

arabicText: قَالَ اللَّهُ تَعَالَى: يَا ابْنَ آدَمَ، إِنَّكَ مَا دَعَوْتَنِي وَرَجَوْتَنِي غَفَرْتُ لَكَ عَلَى مَا كَانَ مِنْكَ وَلَا أُبَالِي
englishTranslation: Allah Almighty said: O son of Adam, as long as you call upon Me and hope in Me, I will forgive you for what you have done, and I do not mind.
